lines_and_colors: Would you like summer? Taste of ours.
Ill! We have berries, for the parching!
Perplexed! Estates of violet trouble ne'er looked on!
Captive! We bring reprieve of roses!
Even for Death, a fairy medicine.
document.title: Would you like summer? Taste of ours.
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Johnson, 1955
